org.dotplot.image
Class JAITools

java.lang.Object
  org.dotplot.image.JAITools

public final class JAITools
extends java.lang.Object

Class containing several tools handling images through JAI (imaging) and iText (PDF).

Author:
Tobias Gesellchen

saveDotplot

static void saveDotplot(IDotplot dotplot,
                        java.io.File target,
                        java.lang.String format,
                        int[][] lut,
                        boolean isOnlyExport,
                        boolean useThread)
Saves the given DotPlot to given file.

Parameters:
dotplot - - the DotPlot image information, must not be null
target - - target file
format - - file format (jpeg, png, pdf, ...)
lut - - look up table for color conversion
useThread - - save in an external thread (background)

exportImageMap

private static void exportImageMap(java.util.Map images,
                                   java.io.File target)
Exports the list of images, that needs to be aggregated. The exported file will help the user to combine the images himself.

aggregateImages

public static java.io.File aggregateImages(java.util.Map indexedImages,
                                           java.awt.Dimension size,
                                           boolean deleteFileAutomatically)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
Aggregates/Combines the images given by indexedImages. The size must be the correct size of the target image.

Parameters:
indexedImages - of the clients to their corresponding image part
size - the target size of the complete image
deleteFileAutomatically - set the returned File to "deleteOnExit"
Returns:
a File, the target image has been saved to. It will be deleted on VM exit if deleteFileAutomatically was true.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an error occurs
